room.name: the foyer
room.short_description: This is the foyer of the mansion
room.long_description: The mansions foyer is a larger room with a stair case in the middle of the room,there are numerous paintings covering the walls

room.name: the dinning room
room.short_description: A large dinning room, you see a large table
room.long_description: The large dinning room contains a large dark wooden table in the center of the room, there is a window to the left overlooking the lake

room.name: the living room
room.short_description: The living room, you see a large tv in the room
room.long_description: The living room, there are couches that surround a large wall mounted tv, there is also bookcases covering the wall to the W

room.name: the old dusty room
room.short_description: The room looks ancient, there is dusty everywhere
room.long_description: The rooms furniture is covered in sheets that have a layer of dust on them,the moon shines an eerie light into the room

room.name: the kitchen
room.short_description: The kitchen looks brand new and is completely cleaned
room.long_description: The kitchens metal counter shines your reflection back at you.There are 4 large ovens and a freezer room in the back

room.name: the basement
room.long_description: The basement is pitch blackexcept for the stairs that lead back up

item.name: key
item.desc: an old rusted key, looks like it will still work

item.name: book
item.desc: a red book, its covered with a lock, feels like there is something inside

item.name: lamp
item.desc: a dusty lamp, looks like it needs fuel

item.name: potion
item.desc: A large potion in a red bottle

item.name: Hat
item.desc: A cool looking hat, it says obey on it
